name: SpaceRogue
description:
Rob randomly generated space ships in this sci-fi roguelike.

Use enviromental hazards to easily take out enemies, or just use the cloak field to slip past them.

Instructions:

  • Use the W A S D or the Arrow keys to move
  • Press Space to skip a turn
  • Press Q to enable cloak field
  • Press R to restart level
  • Press E when you are at exit to finish level
  • Press Tab to show map
  • If you move directly at an enemy, you will melee them, dealing more damage

For the #LOWREZJAM

Now with source!
